body_html:
@benoitsteiner

Thanks for the update, already taken a go-through of your nice paper and really appreciate your fancy RL-based idea illustrated in the paper.
It looks that so far the device placement optimization is still time consuming(around 20 hour with 80 GPUs), so will you integrate it into the TF master revision? Also may I know inside Google how often you will use this RL-based automatic placement solution to accelerate the model training process?

Thanks

body:
@benoitsteiner 

Thanks for the update, already taken a go-through of your nice paper and really appreciate your fancy RL-based idea illustrated in the paper.
It looks that so far the device placement optimization is still time consuming(around 20 hour with 80 GPUs), so will you integrate it into the TF master revision? Also may I know inside Google how often you will use this RL-based automatic placement solution to accelerate the model training process?

Thanks
